record.description: University of Chicago Baseball Team in Japan, autumn 1910. [Photograph taken at Kamakura, Japan before the great bronze of Amida (Daibutsu)]. Left to right: Cleary, Collins, Sunderland, Steinbrecher, Orno Roberts, Glen Roberts, Ehrhorn, Team's guide, Baird, Pat Page, Boyle, and Frank Paul. (Joe Pegues and faculty representative Professor Bliss are not present). Robert W. Baird presented the photograph to the library.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
